name: Configuração com Correção Yarn
postCreateCommand: sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings && curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /etc/apt/keyrings/yarn.gpg > /dev/null && echo 'deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/yarn.gpg] https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list && sudo apt-get update
